thread.section_title: Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic location, so convenient.
thread.title_full: Fantastic location, so convenient. - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Hampshire Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SharonVJ D
title: Fantastic location, so convenient.
text: We have stayed at the Radison Blu twice now and both stays have been brilliant. Large bedrooms, well equipped large bathroom and no noise from either the street or adjacent rooms. Sweets were made available in the foyer since it was half term which our daughter certainly appreciated. Doorman Kieran made us v welcome and was on hand to advise on where to eat or purchase theatre tickets. Gluten free bread was available at breakfast which was a bonus for me.
